column2: Unknown includes those with an unrecorded ethnic origin and those who chose not to declare.
Percentages are calculated from those with a known ethnicity. Personnel with an Unknown ethnicity are excluded from this calculation.
Of the total intake into the Future Reserve 2020 in the 12 months to 30 September 2016, 92.7 per cent had a known ethnicity.
There has been a revision of less than 5 personnel in  the 12 months to 31st March 2016.
